page.title: 10**********Ballet************
page.content:
Ballet is on Monday and Thursday night.It costs me 60p. for three-quarters an hour. On Monday night there are three lessons and on Thursday there are two. There are about 36 children who go ballet. On Monday the times are from 6.15p.m.to 6.45.for the first lesson, then the next lesson starts at 6.45p.m. to 7.30.p.m. and the last lesson at 7.30to 8.15.Some of our dads complained so now it is 8.o'clock. We have ballet in the chapel. We would like to do bar work, but we haven't got a bar. We are now working for an exam. for Grade 2. Last year we put on a concert for people to come and see, and this year we are going to put on a concert again.
Written by Rebbecca Simpson aged 10yrs.
